SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.TAB_NO, BT.TAB_NAME, B.LICENSE_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_DATE >= 1 THEN TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE, 'HH : mm') END AS BOARD_DATE, B.LIKE_COUNT, B.HATE_COUNT, B.VIEW_COUNT, BR.REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_TAB BT ON (B.TAB_NO = BT.TAB_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARD_NO, COUNT(*) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY BOARD_NO ) BR ON (B.BOARD_NO = BR.BOARD_NO)
B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND B.LICENSE_NO = #{licenseNo}
AND B.TAB_NO != 1
AND B.TAB_NO = #{tabNo}
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
ORDER BY (B.LIKE_COUNT - B.HATE_COUNT) DESC
ORDER BY B.VIEW_COUNT DESC
SELECT LICENSE_NAME FROM LICENSE ORDER BY LICENSE_NO

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.TAB_NO, BT.TAB_NAME, B.LICENSE_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_DATE >= 1 THEN TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE, 'HH : mm') END AS BOARD_DATE, B.LIKE_COUNT, B.HATE_COUNT, B.VIEW_COUNT, BR.REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_TAB BT ON (B.TAB_NO = BT.TAB_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARD_NO, COUNT(*) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY BOARD_NO ) BR ON (B.BOARD_NO = BR.BOARD_NO)
B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND B.LICENSE_NO = #{licenseNo}
AND B.TAB_NO = 1
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
